Name: UCSB
Description: A great university located along the California coast! (Photo: history.ucsb.edu)

Name: Goleta Pier
Description: Extending from the Goleta Beach Park, the Goleta Pier is a great spot for fishing, walking, and relaxing with a gorgeous scenery. (Photo: Connie Cooper-Edwards)

Name: Mount Baldy
Description: Located in Southern California, Mt. Baldy is a great location to hike. It's also a great place for skiing and snowboarding in the winter. (Photo: Mtbaldy Resort)

Name: Universal Studios Hollywood
Description: A film studio and a great themepark with fun attractions appropriate for all age groups. (Photo: Universal Studios hollywood)

Name: STAPLES Center
Description: Multipurpose arena in Downtown Los Angeles. Where you can watch home games of Los Angeles Lakers and LA Clippers. (Photo: Discover Los Angeles)

Name: Griffith Park
Description: My favorite park in Claremont where I can play basketball, soccer, or just hang out and chill. (Photo: cdn businessyab)
